autoNameSync.name: Auto-sync actor and token names
autoNameSync.hint: Whenever an actor name changes, update the prototype token name and optionally refresh tokens already on the scene.

syncSceneTokens.name: Update placed tokens
syncSceneTokens.hint: Propagate synchronized names and images to tokens that already exist on the current scene (requires ownership).

autoImageSync.name: Auto-sync token image
autoImageSync.hint: Keep the prototype token image equal to the actor portrait. You can still run manual sync from the sheet panel.

disableTokenRing.name: Disable token ring on sync
disableTokenRing.hint: When automatic sync runs, turn off the prototype token ring (and matching scene tokens) so the portrait is not obscured.

panelEnabled.name: Show sync panel on actor sheets
panelEnabled.hint: Display a minimal overlay with both images and quick actions.

panelPosition.name: Panel position
panelPosition.hint: Choose where the sync panel should appear inside the actor portrait region.

Panel.syncImage: Sync token image from actor portrait
